Package com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.job

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HodJobCallback<T>
    Callback used with the HP Haven OnDemand job API.
    JobService<T extends JobStatus<?>>
    Service for interacting with the job APIs
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractPollingService
    Abstract service containing code common to all job services
    Action<T>
    Holds the result of a job action.
    JobId
    Wrapper class for an HP Haven OnDemand job ID.
    JobId.Builder  
    JobServiceImpl<T extends JobStatus<?>>  
    JobStatus<T>
    The status of a job from HP Haven OnDemand
    PollingJobStatusRunnable<T>
    Runnable which will poll the HP Haven OnDemand job status API until the job has finished or failed
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Status
    Possible job statuses that may be returned from HP Haven OnDemand
